synopsis.text: After drifting through life without direction after college, Rikuo Uozumi begins working at a convenience store, resigned to a monotonous routine. However, his world is soon shaken up by two women: the eccentric Haru Nonaka, who frequents the store with her pet crow, and Rikuo's former classmate Shinako Morinome, on whom he harbored a long-time crush. As Rikuo reconnects with Shinako, he learns she is carrying painful memories that held her back from accepting his past confessions of love. Meanwhile, the lonely yet carefree Haru continues opening up to Rikuo, seeking a friend as she steps into an uncertain future. Through his interactions with the two women at this crossroads in life, Rikuo begins questioning his static situation and re-examining his feelings regarding the past and future. Other vibrant characters additionally touch his life thanks to his job. Together, they experience the joys and complications of embracing change amidst the lingering weight of yesterdayâ€™s emotions.
